asta.model
Interface ITextProcessingStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericTextProcessingStrategy
public interface ITextProcessingStrategy

an interface specification for a text processing strategy

Author:
andreas.gerlach

Method Detail

parse

TextMetaData parse(IFileHandler file)
parses a junk of data and informs about words, punctuation and special keywords found

Parameters:
file - a reference to the file handler for accessing the files content
Returns:
the text meta information generated

addTextProcessListener

void addTextProcessListener(TextProcessStatusListener listener)
add a new listener to the list of listeners connected to the status update events

Parameters:
listener - the listener object that wants to receive status updates

removeTextProcessListener

void removeTextProcessListener(TextProcessStatusListener listener)
remove a listener from the list of connected listeners

Parameters:
listener - the listener object that don't want to receive status updates any longer

toString

java.lang.String toString()
overridden toString representation of the object this is used in the UI to fill the combo-box of available processing strategies the operator can choose from

Overrides:
toString in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
the meaningful name of this processing strategy
